verses.verse: Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and this is the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> gave <S%H559>orders<s%> to gather <S%H3664>together<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigners<s%> who were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H2672>masons<s%> to <S%H2672>cut<s%> <S%H1496>worked<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> for the <S%H4548>nails<s%> for the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and for the <S%H4226>couplings;<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> without <S%H4948>weight;<s%>

and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> without <S%H7230>number:<s%> for the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> and they of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> in <S%H369>abundance<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8010>"Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H7390>tender,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> must be <S%H4605>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1431>magnificent,<s%> of <S%H8034>fame<s%> and of <S%H8597>glory<s%> throughout all <S%H776>countries.<s%> I will therefore make <S%H3559>preparation<s%> for <S%H1732>it.<s%>" So David <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

Then he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> "As for <S%H3824>me,<s%> it was in my heart to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H8210><s%> 'You have shed <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly,<s%> and have <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4421>wars.<s%> You shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> to my <S%H8034>name,<s%> because you have <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight.<s%>

<S%H1121>Behold,<s%> a son shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H376>you,<s%> who shall be a man of <S%H4496>rest.<s%> I will give him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> all <S%H5439>around;<s%> for his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H8253>quietness<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in his <S%H3117>days.<s%>

He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name;<s%> and he shall be my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and I will be his <S%H1>father;<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever.<s%>'

<S%H1121>Now,<s%> my son, may <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be with you and <S%H6743>prosper<s%> <S%H1129>you,<s%> and build the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as he has spoken concerning <S%H1696>you.<s%>

May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7922>discretion<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> and put you in <S%H6680>charge<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> that so you may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then you will <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> if you <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>gave<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and <S%H553>courageous.<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>

<S%H6040>Now,<s%> behold, in my affliction I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H505>one<s%> <S%H505>million<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> without <S%H4948>weight;<s%> for it is in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%> I have also <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H68>stone;<s%> and you may add to <S%H3254>them.<s%>

There are also <S%H6213>workmen<s%> with you in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> <S%H2672>cutters<s%> and <S%H2796>workers<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> and <S%H6086>timber,<s%> and all kinds of <S%H2450>men<s%> who are skillful in every kind of <S%H4399>work:<s%>

of the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and the <S%H1270>iron,<s%> there is no <S%H4557>number.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise<s%> and be <S%H6213>doing,<s%> and may Yahweh be with <S%H3068>you.<s%>"
<S%H1732>David<s%> also <S%H6680>commanded<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> saying,

<S%H3068>"Isn't<s%> Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H5117>you?<s%> Hasn't he given you rest on every <S%H5439>side?<s%> For he has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise<s%> <S%H1129>therefore,<s%> and build the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
